theorems.label: thm-post-perturbation-status-update-continuity
theorems.name: Probabilistic Continuity of the Post-Perturbation Status Update

constants.name: Boundary Instability Factor
constants.description: Lipschitz constant for death probability from Axiom of Boundary Regularity

constants.name: Boundary Smoothing Exponent
constants.description: Hölder exponent for boundary regularity from Axiom of Boundary Regularity

notes: Section contains 1 main definition (Status Update Operator)
Contains 1 major theorem with complete proof
Theorem establishes probabilistic continuity of composed operator $\Psi_{\text{status}} \circ \Psi_{\text{pert}}$
Proof uses Bernoulli variance analysis and Hölder continuity bounds
Constants $L_{\text{death}}$ and $\alpha_B$ come from Axiom of Boundary Regularity
Includes note on probabilistic status variants and independence assumption
